Index entries for Bernoulli numbers B(2n)
prog: (Sage)def A036281_list(len):    R, C = [1], [1]+[0]*(len-1)    for n in (1..len-1):        for k in range(n, 0, -1):            C[k] = -C[k-1] / (k*(4*k+2))        C[0] = -sum(C[k] for k in (1..n))        R.append(C[0].denominator())    return Rprint A036281_list(15) # _Peter Luschny_, Feb 21 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
